name: CubeTime
description: You are a cube, and you need to move very quickly to geometric shapes and collect control points. The goal of the game is to hold out as much as possible in time and collect more control points.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer: 32bit / 64bit Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM Storage: 50 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
